channel.title: Shooters on Game Rift
channel.description: Recent content in Shooters on Game Rift

item.title: Mindkatt: first stud
item.description: Game Description **mindkatt: first strike ** represents a setting in which cats with developed intelligence use mechanical structures to interact in human society. This project puts players in a futuristic environment, where despotistical orders reign. These cats, having passed serious mental evolution, are in contact with the world through robotic devices. Their life in this difficult era, subject to people, forms the core of history. In the general world, Mindkatt: First Strike, human groups are kept under the control of Mindkatt - a developed type of cats facing slavery.

item.title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Call of Prypiat - Enhanced Edition
item.description: Game Description **S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Call of Prypiat - Enhanced Edition ** puts the player in the role of Major Degtyarev, an intelligence officer sent to the cover under the cover. Its task is to find out the causes of the failure of the military operation and the disappearance of the detachment. Events unfold in the Pripyat region, where everything is permeated with dangers: anomalies, radiation, hostile groups and an unstable situation.

item.title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Clear Sky - Enhanced Edition
item.description: Game Description **S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Clear Sky - Enhanced Edition ** transfers a gamer to the role of a mercenary named Scar, forced to survive among warring groups, unstable abnormalities and deadly emissions. The action takes place to the events of the previous title of the series, demonstrating the origins of the territorial split in the zone. The basis of the mechanics is the system of wars of fractions - with its help, the user is able to change the alignment of forces between armed formations.

item.title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Shadow of Chornobyl - Enhanced Edition
item.description: Game Description **S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Shadow of Chornobyl - Enhanced Edition ** transferred gamers to the alienation zone around the Chernobyl nuclear power plant, where anomalies, armed groups and mutants act outside the law framework. Movement in this territory depends on food supplies, the level of radiation, the number of cartridges and relations with other characters. Plot tasks can be performed in different ways using research, shootings and dialogs. The environment is a constant danger, which requires attention to details, and not following the finished routes.

item.title: Chambers
item.description: Game Description **Chambers ** Simits a gamer in a role -playing shooter with a wild West setting with its own features. The plot puts the protagonist in the world, split by the war for a drink, where the antagonists, known as the Reds, seized power. These enemies divided the territory into separate zones - cameras. The main character moves around this world in search of a specific coffin. An unusual environment combines the elements of the western with gloomy humor and horror.

item.title: Tank Squad
item.description: Game Description **Tank Squad ** transfers players during the Second World War, to the most intense territories, whose fate will affect the outcome of the clash. The user will visit the role of captain of the tank detachment, taking part in the iconic battles of that time. Scenarios will include historical battles for a single -user or cooperative passage of three participants at the same time. In the multiplayer, each gamer is able to control their own team, or unite among themselves and become a separate crew member.

item.title: Deadzone: Rogue
item.description: Game Description **Deadzone: rogue ** immerses the gamer into events on board the ISS-X vessel, located in deep space, where the protagonist recovers without memories. Faced with the upcoming legions of hostile vehicles, the character is forced to enter into battles from the first person in the compartments of the ship, from machine departments to the Kardzer. Survival depends on the movement of these locations and collisions with numerous mechanical opponents.

item.title: Vivat Slovakia
item.description: Game Description **Vivat Slovakia ** offers players to plunge into the open world of the action that unfolds in the Slovakia of the 1990s. This country, which has recently gained independence and located at the junction of the East and West, is influenced by the remnants of the communist era and at the same time emerging capitalism. This situation weakens state institutions, creating the conditions for the spread of corruption, where power is in resources.

item.title: Gruel
item.description: Game Description **Gruel ** - this is an exciting first -person shooter in which chaos reigns in the endless arena. Users move around the unpredictable temple, faced with a series of constantly changing rooms filled with bizarre enemies. Each step forward is a new challenge that makes reflexes and adapt to the limit. Traditional shooting mechanics fades into the background, and improvisation becomes a key point. Movement is constantly, fluctuations lead to disaster, and the only way out is a passage.

item.title: Democrators
item.description: Game Description **Desecrators ** offers Gamer the role of the cosmic marauder, operating in the Galaxy Milky Way in 4096. Humanity has erected numerous large structures in mastered star systems, from deep processing stations to orbital complexes, often containing valuable technologies, weapons and resources. On board the Nightingale FTL Cracer, the character acts as a well-known defiler, making raids on the selected objects. The task is to accumulate a destructive arsenal and sufficient technologies to try to storm the legendary storage facilities of the Galactic Treasury, but this path runs through the galaxy full of dangers for all prey hunters.

item.title: Endless Alice
item.description: Game Description **endless alice ** - this is an adventure from a third person with an intriguing combination of elements of the Rowlaik and visual design, inspired by anime. Title invites gamers to explore a huge, constantly changing world, where each solution can determine their path. Six characters to choose from, each of which offers its own set of abilities and styles of battle, allow users to combine them in accordance with their style.

item.title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl
item.description: Game Description S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl is a first-person shooter in a post-apocalyptic world. The events of the game will develop in the exclusion zone formed as a result of the disaster at the Chernobyl nuclear power plant. In 2006, a new catastrophe occurred, which led to various physical, chemical and biological processes, creating many anomalies, artifacts and generating a large number of mutants. The gameplay is a classic FPS with elements of a role-playing game, immersive sim and horror.

item.title: Bullet Runner
item.description: Game Description The dynamic shootouts in Bullet Runner show the adventures of a pixelated man who is forced to resist against a crowd of evil opponents. The game is a top-down action shooter where you have to fight with various opponents. The project is filled with fast and active gameplay, where users can test the speed of their reaction to current events. You’ll have to move around the map and shoot enemies using a wide arsenal of weapons.

item.title: Outbreak: Shades of Horror Chromatic Split
item.description: Game Description Outbreak: Shades of Horror Chromatic Split takes users into the disturbing environment of Cypress Ridge, where chaos reigns amid a zombie outbreak. Set in the early moments of this disaster, gamers are given the choice of one of two different characters: Lydia, a seasoned police officer, or Hank, a figure shrouded in mystery whose goals differ sharply from Lydia’s. These choices affect how users interact with the narrative, resulting in different experiences as they navigate a city filled with danger.

item.title: The Dawn: Sniper's Way
item.description: Game Description The Dawn: Sniper’s Way crosses a post-apocalyptic setting with a post-Soviet atmosphere. The game invites you to wander around Seversk. This is the name of a fictional industrial city. Previously, research laboratories and a nuclear power plant operated on its territory. In 1981, a disaster occurred there due to floods. After this, all residents were evacuated, and the settlement was abandoned. The video game itself takes place many years later, in 2025.

item.title: Witchfire
item.description: Game Description Witchfire suggests using not only weapons in the process, but also various devices in order to survive after an encounter with monsters. An arsenal consisting of dozens of different items and a variety of enemies will help gamers realize their own shooting skills. Challenge the most dangerous monsters that live in this world. Here it is important to select the right type of weapon in accordance with the situation and type of enemy.

item.title: Hive Jump 2: Survivors
item.description: Game Description Hive Jump 2: Survivors is a sci-fi role-playing adventure game with action elements. In this adrenaline-pumping sequel to the acclaimed action-platformer, you’ll find yourself the only survivor of your squad, stranded on an alien planet. Armed with only your guns and your trusty jetpack, you set out on a mission of revenge. Here you have to fight relentless waves of killer insects. What is your goal? Destroy these swarms of aliens and collect their valuable entrails.

item.title: Rum and Gun
item.description: Game Description Rum and Gun uses a pirate theme as its setting. The hero travels through the lands located in the Indian Ocean, fighting on land with people and monsters. He is trying to stop the captain, who has enlisted the help of evil forces. He also has to learn the secrets of the Drunken God. The plot is presented with jokes and self-irony. History is divided into acts. This is an isometric shooter and action game with role-playing elements.

item.title: UBOAT
item.description: Game Description UBOAT is a unique simulator of submarine control during the Second World War. Observe and take direct part in the life of German submariners in the midst of war, when at any moment their refuge could turn into the place of their death. Survive in the open world and control all processes occurring on the submarine. Your players must be well-fed and energized so that your gameplay is not doomed to failure.

item.title: Genome Guardian
item.description: Game Description **Genome Guardian ** transfers gamers to the environment, where a microscopic becomes a scene for a high -octane action. This is a game where the usual meets the unusual, offering the world filled with microscopic organisms, some of which are harmless, while others are far from the case. A distinctive feature is that it is based on the mixing and selection of DNA nucleotides to create bio -weapons, which serves you the main protection from the hostile environment.

item.title: Macross -shooting Insight-
item.description: Game Description Macross -shooting Insight - This is a title in which the rapid action of the sword fighting is embodied in a fascinating form. The control of the transformable Veritech fighters, immersing gamers into high -tied missions with lateral scrolling, is based. Target? To fight the formidable forces of Zentradi is a task that requires accuracy, quick reflexes and confident ownership of various mechanics that the game offers. Are you a fan of the Mecha genre or just like good Sidskrollers, this adventure will not leave a place for boredom.

item.title: Empty Shell
item.description: Game Description **Empty Shell ** will send you to the very heart of a dark and dangerous industrial environment at a secret facility on the Japanese island. You have to perform a “recovery operation”, which you know a little about, but this is only the beginning. You will find yourself at an object that was abandoned for decades, but something is wrong in it. Solve dark secrets, dig in the documents and magazines of the 1950s and find out the stories of the people who worked there.

item.title: Payday 3
item.description: Game Description **Payday 3 ** - The second continuation of the original multiplayer game dedicated to the life of robbers and their sorties to dangerous crimes for making money and respect in gang circles, an analogue of levels from other projects. By increasing authority, new types of weapons and customization items will be unlocked, allowing you to create a unique appearance of the protagonist. This part of the franchise uses the Unreal Engine 4 engine.

item.title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2019
item.description: Game Description **Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2019 ** - Restation of the first part of the Modern Warfare series released in 2007. The plot tells about the war in Syria and Iraq. The cooperative game tells about the conflict in the east of Ukraine. The gameplay includes 5 groups: SAS, al-Katala, CIA, Urzikstan militia and the RF Armed Forces. Actions will take place in two fictional powers: Castovia and Urzyikostan.

item.title: Psychosis
item.description: Game Description **psychosis ** is a retro-game in the Survival-Horror style, in which the gamer has to fight with demons and his own reason in the endless hell. In this psychological horror, you will have to fight with a breathtaking gameplay for an hour to survive in the surrounding perverted world. The plot begins with the fact that after midnight the protagonist arrives a mysterious phone call. The voice on the other end of the line urgently asks the hero to come as soon as possible, because they all left.

item.title: ZERO Sievert
item.description: Game Description Plunging into ZERO Sievert, you will have to go on dangerous journeys through the post-apocalyptic expanses of a dying world, taking you to the terrain of a desolate alternative race. Taking control of one of the characters, you have to go on dangerous adventures, delving into creepy and gloomy places filled with strange phenomena and creatures that live beyond the limits of human vision. Adventures in ZERO Sievert immerse you in an atmosphere of loneliness and independent survival in wild conditions, full of unexplored places and unexplored locations through which the protagonist will have to wander and look for useful items for life support.

item.title: Gunfire Reborn
item.description: Game Description The shooter Gunfire Reborn contains elements of a roguelike and role-playing game. The player can choose to control several heroes with individual abilities. The game has a huge amount of randomness, from procedurally generated locations to dropped guns and loot. Gunfire Reborn is designed for both one and a company of up to 4 people. The game features 100 different types of items. Various mechanics will encourage you to study each fighter presented, who are more or less suitable for a specific situation and location.

item.title: Squad
item.description: Game Description Squad is a military tactical first person shooter game. This is a multiplayer game with an emphasis on realism. An important role is assigned to team interaction between users. This project does not have a story campaign or single player modes. Instead, players in it capture points, destroy weapons depots, or hold the defense. The title was originally called Project Reality. This was a modification for the second “Battle”.

item.title: Fallout 76
item.description: Game Description According to the plot of Fallout 76, the first people came out of shelters after a nuclear war. They set off to explore the Wasteland, where mutants are already lying in wait. The player will be able to visit 6 regions, each of which has its own types of dangerous animals and landscape. Among the scorched desert there are also wooded areas with red trees. What is most surprising is that quite recently the desert territories were inhabited by those who were able to survive the apocalypse on the surface.

item.title: Borderlands 3
item.description: Game Description Borderlands 3 is a continuation of the acclaimed series of shooters, containing tons of loot. The player will take on the role of one of the Vault Hunters and set off to explore the expanses of Pandora. All heroes have their own tree of characteristics, unique abilities and character. The gameplay allows you to go through the adventure solo or enlist the help of friends. The protagonist of Borderlands 3 learned to climb ledges and make tackles.

item.title: Metro Exodus: Gold Edition
item.description: Game Description The events of Metro Exodus - a first-person shooter with elements of stealth and horror - take place in the same areas as the previous parts. The Russian Federation and the Republic of Kazakhstan are still waging a fierce war for life inside, in underground territories, with representatives of hostile clans, factions and monsters who devour, rather than kill, their prey. Artyom leaves the Order after the battle for D6.

item.title: Resident Evil 2 Remake
item.description: Game Description RESIDENT EVIL 2 / BIOHAZARD RE:2 - a complete rework, allowing players to enjoy modern graphics, a new engine, enemies, weapons and a much more advanced game story. Follow the story of police officer Leon S. Kennedy and student Claire Redfield. Due to an unknown outbreak of a virus, the entire city of Raccoon City was enveloped in monsters, people began to turn into strange creatures, and then kill the survivors.

item.title: DayZ
item.description: Game Description The multiplayer sandbox DayZ is a reworked version of the mod of the same name for Arma 2. The game is distinguished by its extremely realistic setting and hardcore survival in a post-apocalyptic environment. The game takes place in the fictional post-Soviet country of Chernarus. After the outbreak of an unknown virus, most of the population has turned into zombies, and the survivors are forced to fight for their lives and valuable resources.

item.title: Rust
item.description: Game Description Rust (Rust) An ideal first-person survival simulator is not a simple escape from a city or civilization, but a necessary measure based on the conditions of our player. In Rust we will have to kill people, animals, build houses, dwellings, try to make fire out of nothing and survive in a world where everything is trying to kill us. The gameplay begins with the fact that we find ourselves on an island.

item.title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare Remastered
item.description: Game Description **Call of Duty: Modern Warfare Remastered ** - reprinting the popular game about hostilities in the hot spots of the planet. Now the gamers have the opportunity to go through the familiar episodes “Everything in camouflage”, “Charlie is not a surf”, “Permission to eliminate the crew” only with improved textures, a more clear picture, which is extremely close to reality by physics, overwritten sound and other technologies of our time.

item.title: Ravenfield
item.description: Game Description The team-tactical shooter Ravenfield will allow you to plunge into furious battles, where you have everything - from tanks to fleets. There is a complete lack of storyline and even multiplayer. The latter fact is extremely unusual for projects of this genre. It would seem that it is interesting to play against bots and when there are no real users on the map. This omission at first glance is more than compensated for by a fairly developed artificial intelligence - opponents and allies behave extremely intelligently and together with them you can perform a variety of tactics using numerous commands and options.

item.title: Pavlov VR
item.description: Game Description Pavlov VR is a multiplayer shooter with a first-person view. As the name suggests, the project is designed for owners of virtual reality helmets. In addition to VR devices, you will need motion controllers and a lot of space in the room. This military joker must be played while standing. Pavlov VR uses 2 settings at once. You can fight in the modern world or in the realities of World War II.

item.title: Rise of the Tomb Raider
item.description: Game Description Our task in Rise of the Tomb Raider is to get ahead of your enemies, go on your first expedition and watch interactive videos, of which there are at least 1.5 hours of gameplay in the game. Lara Croft goes to the unknown world of the city of Kitezh. A secret organization called “Trinity” is also heading there. The principle of the game about Lara is an adventure game mixed with the adventure romance of the first journey, in which we kill with a bow, collect important items, and sometimes survive in the wild.

item.title: Fallout 4
item.description: Game Description Fallout 4 is a sequel to the famous role-playing game series in a post-apocalyptic setting. The player wakes up from cryosleep and discovers that he is the only survivor of Vault 111. Having made it to the surface, he finds himself in the Wasteland - a world destroyed by nuclear war. The gameplay includes: a free open world with hundreds of locations to explore, a huge number of NPCs, companions and quests, as well as interaction with many factions, including the Institute, the Brotherhood of Steel, the Minutemen and agents of the Underground; S.

item.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 3
item.description: Game Description The first-person shooter Call of Duty: Black Ops III demonstrates the blurred relationship between ordinary people and technology. In it you will forever forget that the new generation of soldiers is not a fiction, but a reality that will overtake us in the near future. Humanity has created technology to be leaders in the coming war, but will it be? The game shows this in three modes: story campaign, multiplayer shooter at scenario locations, and also in zombie mode.

item.title: Broforce
item.description: Game Description Broforce is a powerful paramilitary organization that is called upon when the world is in danger due to an excessive number of evil forces. Take control of dozens of different brothers to counter terrorist attacks and save civilians. Destroy your opponents with napalm, shooting, lightning and other various character skills. Broforce is a 2D shooter platformer with pixel graphics. You will move around locations, destroying opponents in every possible way.

item.title: Insurgency
item.description: Game Description Insurgency is a first-person shooter, in which the developers focused on playing in cooperative or multiplayer mode, about the Iraq War. The protagonist is a member of the US PMC, and he is fighting against Iraqi insurgents. The player chooses one side at the beginning of the match, and after that a brutal fight begins between the two factions. The basis of the game is a confrontation between two teams, which include 16 people.

item.title: PayDay 2
item.description: Game Description Re-join the PayDay 2 gang as Dallas, Hoxton, Chains or Wolfe, who have come to Washington to rob and make a lot of money. Put the mask on your favorite hero and set off to carry out your next crime, in which you will need to overcome many obstacles before reaching your goal. Now you will have a wide variety of contracts to choose from, from which you can choose any one.

item.title: BioShock Infinite
item.description: Game Description BioShock Infinite is a first-person shooter with multiple mechanics of a role-playing adventure in the style of science fiction and steampunk. The game will take place in 1912 in an alternative universe, in the flying city of the United States of America - Columbia. You need to control the private detective Booker Devitt, who has a task to find a cute girl named Elizabeth. Immediately after it is found, the main characters find themselves in the very epicenter of the war.

item.title: Borderlands 2
item.description: Game Description Borderlands 2 is a shooter with a view from the perspective of the protagonist and leveling up abilities and passive improvements, as in the role-playing adventure genre. A direct continuation of the story of the original game. The main differences from the first part are a greater emphasis on the plot component and the addition of a more advanced weapon editor with many possible modifications that open up as you progress.

item.title: Saints Row: The Third
item.description: Game Description The Third Street Saints are a large and large group in the universe of the game Saints Row: The Third. The third-person shooter with its crazy plots gave the game’s heroes their own brand of sneakers, a carbonated drink and a logo, and now they have to fight the world’s largest crime syndicate, whose people are scattered around the world and do their work in the “shadows”. Since the main characters have long captured Stillwater, the Syndicate demands offerings from them in the form of tribute for the criminal leadership.

item.title: Garry's Mod
item.description: Game Description Garry’s Mod is a game and physics sandbox. The main game mode is aimless and provides the player with a freely customizable world powered by the Source engine. The player creates non-player characters with various interaction objects. Special tools and tools allow you to construct new objects in reality, fix beams, iron, objects. Changing facial expressions is also available. Thanks to the flexible engine, users create their own modifications: Spacebuild, Wiremod, Elevator: Source, DarkRP, Prop Hunt and others.

item.title: Counter-Strike: Source
item.description: Game Description Emerging as a worthy competitor to its previous installment, Counter-Strike: Source is an updated version 1.6 in which players found both disadvantages and advantages. For example, in the new part, many weapons have a completely different bullet spread, which is why players had to get used to it for a long time. The ballistics and shooting technique have not changed, but the graphics and the “atmosphere of an open location” added additional charm to the game for fans of the first-person shooter.

item.title: Mother Hub
item.description: Game Description **Mother Hub ** - this is not a typical shooter. This game throws you headlong into a hopeless situation - humanity on the edge of the abyss, and only you keep the reins of government. Each of your solution, each path you have chosen can become the difference between survival and oblivion. Fasten, because here the choice has consequences. Here it is not just that you need to press the trigger.

item.title: Coven
item.description: Game Description Going to the gloomy world of Coven, you have to deal with a large number of enemy creatures and deal with their elimination. The universe takes you into an atmospheric medieval fantasy world, where witches and other mythical creatures live alongside people. The first episode is available in the game, where you will take on the role of a young girl. The heroine is burned at the stake during the 1600s, mistaken for a witch and a fiend.

item.title: Clockwork Ambrosia
item.description: Game Description **Clockwork Ambrosia ** Submits you into the world of secrets and chaos. Take control of Iris, a fearless engineer, and go to the shadow depths of the distant island. The research colony has discovered ambrosia - a substance that can rewrite the rules of invention. But something went wrong. Now silence hung in the air. Iris will have to navigate this interconnected world, fighting with monstrous creations and mechanized monsters.

item.title: Drive Beyond Horizons
item.description: Game Description **Drive Beond Horizons ** Refuses the line path and throws gamers into a huge, constantly changing world. Fasten the belts and get ready for the study - the procedurally generated landscapes make each game unique. Leave the comfort zone and choose your own route. Travel through spacious deserts, lush forests, on any roads (or their absence). But this is not just an excursion trip. Drive Beond Horizons is fraught with many secrets and difficulties that have to be solved.

item.title: Schedule I
item.description: Game Description **Schedule 1 ** puts a gamer in the place of a small drug dealer trying to build a criminal empire from scratch. The action takes place in the gloomy city of Highland Point, and users get the opportunity to expand the scale of their activities, controlling everyone - from production to sales. You will begin with an empty wallet and the necessary connections, gradually rising to control over the criminal world.
